2007-05-25

You like the shoes I wear #9 - Lou Reed


Lou Reed's sneakers
(originally uploaded by ptufts)

Given Lou Reed's penchant for mullets, sleeveless T-shirts and ugly tinted glasses I was a bit apprehensive of hunting down his footwear of choice. I'm not sure what I imagined he'd wear but...actually he's probably always been cool from the waist down.

#9 Lou Reed and his smart red 'sneakers'

MP3:Lou Reed's Hair (3.8MB) - Angel Corpus Christi's commentary on Lou's dubious choice of hairstyle from her excellent 'tribute' album Louie Louie
